question: You have seen an advertisement from a couple, who live in Australia, for someone to teach their two children your language for a year.Write a letter to the couple. In your letterExplain why you think you would be suitable for the jobSay what else you could do for the familyGive your reasons for wanting the job
text: I am Supun from Sri Lanka, and I am writing this with regards to the advertisement that I read in the "Sunday Times" on 24th September 2022.

To begin with, let me explain  my qualifications and brief description of myself. Currently, I am a tutor at the Sri Lankan language school. There, I am teaching Spanish and French languages to kids like yours.

In addition to my teaching skills, I am quite good at gardening and cooking. Moreover, I have worked in a well-known Sri Lankan family restaurant, so I am well experienced in organizing small family parties as well.

Finally, let me explain why I am so desperate to have a job. I will be visiting Australia in the next month for research that I am going to do with Melbourne university. So it would be great if I can have a part-time job at that time to cover my expenses.
It would be great if can reply to me as soon as possible, so I can arrange it myself as it is. I look forward to hearing from you.
